statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ 9 \\ -1 \\ 7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -19 \\ -3 \\ -15 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 17 \\ 3 \\ -8 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
